thread.title: Heichel: Snow enhances Cascade of Lights
thread.title_full: Heichel: Snow enhances Cascade of Lights

author: Nicholas Vercilla | New Castle News
title: Heichel: Snow enhances Cascade of Lights
text:
Last weekend’s snowfall was a double-edged sword for New Castle Public Works Director Brian Heichel.
On the one hand, his employees worked around the clock to keep the city and state roads clear of snow and ice.
